description.value:
You raise your arms to the sky and pray fervently, surrounding yourself in a beacon of holy light. The beacon sheds bright light in a @Template[cylinder|distance:30]{30-foot-radius, 100-foot-high cylinder} centered on you until the beginning of your next turn. Creatures with the shadow trait in the area must succeed at a @Check[will|against:class-spell] save equal to your class DC or spell DC (whichever is higher) or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 1 round.

Regardless of the result, creatures are then temporarily immune to this ability for 24 hours.
